sect2.title: Life Cycle
sect2.para: For &productname;, the following life cycles and release cycles apply:

listitem.para: &productname; has a X-year life cycle: Y years of general support and Z years of extended support.
Major releases are published every A years. Service packs are published every B months.
&suse; supports previous &productname; service packs for C months after the release of a new service pack.

sect2.para: Long Term Service Pack Support (LTSS) may be available for &productname;. For information about our support policy and options, see and .
Modules have a different life cycle, update policy, and update timeline than their base products. Modules contain software packages and are fully supported parts of &productname;.
